author: rick
msg: The number of columns in a table was determined simply by counting the
number of TD & TH elements in the first row.
Changed this so that the number of columns is determined by the number
of TD & TH as well as including any @colspan attributes defined in those

author: rick
msg: Handle div and span elements by simply applying templates and passing
through information to those other templates.
